name: argon-password-generator-chirho
title: Argon Password Generator
description: Generate Django-compatible Argon2 password hashes with customizable parameters
author: lovejesus

commands.name: argon-password-generator-chirho
commands.title: Argon Password Generator
commands.subtitle: Generate Django-compatible Argon2 hashes
commands.description: Generate Django-compatible Argon2 password hashes with customizable parameters

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
